document.name: Domain Administration Form

functionality.item: Collect domain information via a form for further processing.
Use AJAX methods to allow for any action on a domain (create, modify, search or delete).
Requests for top-level domains will require human approval and out-of-band communication via email.

document.assumptions: This page is served by a Web server and is URL addressable.
document.preconditions: Requests for modification or deletion require that a domain already exist.
document.postconditions: A new domain or subdomain may be created upon creation request.
